languages.text:
The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g}, they gain +3 more stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Архмилитант немедленно получает {uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Если у архмилитанта есть уровни "универсальности", он получает еще 3 уровня этого эффекта, которые действуют до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Veteran immediately gains (3 + Veteran's AGI bonus) movement points. If the Veteran has Right Tool for the Job stacks, those stacks are doubled until the end of turn, but at the end of turn the Veteran loses all stacks that were doubled.

The Veteran immediately gains <u>(3 + Veteran's AGI bonus)</u> MP.
If the Veteran has stacks of right tool for the job, those stacks are doubled until the end of turn, but the Veteran loses all stacks that were doubled at the end of the turn.

The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of versatility, they gain +3 more stacks of versatility which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of versatility, the number is increased by 3 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but the Arch-Militant loses all stacks that were added at the end of the turn.

The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of versatility, they gain +3 more stacks of versatility which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text:
首席战士立刻获得{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
如果首席战士拥有{g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}“多才多艺“{/g}层数，则额外获得3层{g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}“多才多艺“{/g}效果，持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g}, they gain +3 more stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
首席战士立刻获得{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
如果首席战士拥有“多才多艺”层数，则额外获得3层“多才多艺”效果，持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

老兵立刻获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a}。
如果老兵拥有“合适装备”层数，则此层数会翻倍，直到{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止，但回合结束时，老兵会失去所有翻倍的层数。

languages.text:
El Archimilitante gana inmediatamente +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Si el Archimilitante tiene acumulaciones de {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatilidad{/g}, gana +3 acumulaciones adicionales que duran hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g}, they gain +3 more stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El Archimilitante gana inmediatamente +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Si el Archimilitante tiene acumulaciones de Versatilidad, gana +3 acumulaciones adicionales que duran hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

El veterano gana inmediatamente {uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Si el veterano tiene acumulaciones de Herramienta adecuada, las acumulaciones se duplican hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero al terminar el turno pierde las acumulaciones duplicadas.

languages.text:
アーク・ミリタントは即座に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a}を獲得する。
アーク・ミリタントが汎用性のスタックを持っている場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで汎用性を+3獲得する。
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of versatility, they gain +3 more stacks of versatility which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
アーク・ミリタントは即座に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a}を獲得する。
アーク・ミリタントが汎用性のスタックを持っている場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで汎用性を+3獲得する。

古参（ベテラン）が瞬時に{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}獲得する。
古参（ベテラン）が適切な手段のスタックを所有している場合、それらのスタック数は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで2倍になるが、ターン終了時に2倍になったすべてのスタックを失う。

languages.text:
Архмилитант немедленно получает {uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Если у архмилитанта есть уровни {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}универсальности{/g}, он получает еще 3 уровня этого эффекта, которые действуют до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g}, they gain +3 more stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Архмилитант немедленно получает {uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Если у архмилитанта есть уровни {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}универсальности{/g}, он получает еще 3 уровня этого эффекта, которые действуют до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Ветеран немедленно получает <u>(3 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} ветерана)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Если на ветерана действует эффект "подходящий способ", то число его уровней удваивается до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, после чего все добавленные уровни исчезают.

Ветеран немедленно получает {uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Если на ветерана действует эффект "подходящий способ", то число его уровней удваивается до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, после чего все добавленные уровни исчезают.

languages.text:
Der Erzmilitant erhält augenblicklich +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Sollte der Erzmilitant {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Vielseitigkeit{/g}-Stapel haben, werden diese Stapel bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} verdoppelt, am Ende des Zugs verliert er jedoch sämtliche hinzugefügten Stapel.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g}, they gain +3 more stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Erzmilitant erhält augenblicklich {uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Sollte der Erzmilitant Stapel von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job haben, werden diese Stapel bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} verdoppelt, danach aber verliert er sämtliche hinzugefügten Stapel.

Der Veteran erhält augenblicklich {uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Sollte der Veteran Stapel von Die richtig Methode für den Job haben, werden diese Stapel bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} verdoppelt, danach aber verliert er sämtliche verdoppelten Stapel.

languages.text:
L'archimilitant bénéficie immédiatement de +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
S'il possède déjà des cumuls de {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Polyvalence{/g}, il en obtient 3 de plus jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant immediately gains +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
If the Arch-Militant has stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g}, they gain +3 more stacks of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g} which last until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
L'archimilitant bénéficie immédiatement de +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
S'il possède déjà des cumuls de Polyvalence, il en obtient 3 de plus jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

Le Vétéran bénéficie immédiatement de {uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
Si ce Vétéran possède des cumuls d'Outil Adéquat, ces cumuls sont doublés jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais il perd tous les cumuls doublés à la fin du tour.

L'archimilitant bénéficie immédiatement de +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
S'il possède déjà des cumuls de Polyvalence, il en obtient 3 de plus jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text:
Başmilitan, anında +{uip|MovementPoints|801926b855d64391b465b6d75796a19a} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır.
Başmilitan'ın {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}çok yönlülük{/g} birikimi varsa +3 daha {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}çok yönlülük{/g} birikimi kazanır. Bu birikimler, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda kaybolur.
